Entries.MovieInvite_Festival: The cinema isn't open on festival days!
Entries.MovieInvite_Closed: The cinema is closed for the night...
Entries.MovieInvite_AlreadyInvitedSomeone: You've already made plans to see a film with {0} today!
Entries.MovieInvite_CantInvite: You cannot invite {0} to the cinema.
Entries.MovieInvite_InvitedBySomeoneElse: Sorry, I've already got plans to see a film today, but maybe you can join us there?
Entries.MovieInvite_FarmerAlreadySeen: I don't feel like going to the cinema again just yet...
Entries.MovieInvite_AlreadySeen: Sorry, I've already seen a film this week...
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Dwarf: What's a fillum? Well, I'm sure I'll like it! I'd be happy to go with you.
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Krobus: Oh? I normally hide myself from humans...#$b#But I have an idea... I'll meet you at the cinema later.
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited: A film? Sure. I'll meet you at the cinema.
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Rude: A film? Yeah, whatever, sounds good. See you at the cinema...
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Child: A film? Yay! Let's meet up at the cinema!
Entries.MovieInvite_Reject: Sorry, I'm not in the mood to see a film right now...
Entries.MovieTheater_NoTicket: You cannot enter the cinema without a ticket!
Entries.MovieTheater_CurrentlyShowing: A film is currently being shown, come back again later.
Entries.MovieTheater_AlreadySeen: You've already seen a film this week.
Entries.MovieTheater_WatchAlonePrompt: Would you like to spend your cinema ticket to see a film by yourself?
Entries.MovieTheater_WatchWithFriendPrompt: Would you like to spend your cinema ticket to see a film with {0}?
Entries.MovieTheater_LeavePrompt: Are you sure you want to leave the cinema without watching the fim?
Entries.MovieTheater_ClosedFestival: The cinema is closed for the festival.
Entries.MovieTheater_ConcessionPurchased: You wanted the {0}, right? We'll deliver it to {1}'s seat once the film starts!
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Abigail: A film? Sure, sounds fun! I'll meet you at the cinema.$h#$e#I hope it's an exciting one.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Penny: A cinema ticket? Yes, I'd love to go with you! I'll meet you at the cinema, honey.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Haley: Oooh... date night, huh? Let me just freshen up a little and I'll meet you at the cinema.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Emily: A film! You know, I was thinking about the cinema all day. You must've read my mind! $h#$e#I'll meet you there.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Leah: Oh, a film? Sure, sounds fun.... It'll be like we're dating again, hehe.$h#$e#I'll meet you at the cinema.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Maru: Oh! You planned a date night for us? $h#$b#I'd love to go! I'll see you at the cinema.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Alex: Hey, sounds fun! I've been wanting to see this one... and I'd rather see it with you!#$b#I'll meet you at the cinema.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sam: Nice! You got us tickets? You're the best! I'll wait for you at the cinema.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sebastian: Oh, you want to go to the cinema? Sounds pretty good. I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Shane: Oh, you want to see a film, huh? Buy me a snack and it's a deal, hehe...$h#$e#I'll meet you there.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Elliott: Yes, my dear, I'd love to see a film with you! I'll meet you at the cinema.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Harvey: Cinema tickets? Well... yes, I'd love to go with you!$h#$e#It's good to do things like this, I don't want married life to get boring for you!
Entries.Phone_Robin_Open: Hello? Hey! Yes, I'm currently open for business... please swing by before 17:00 if you need anything! *click* $h
Entries.Phone_Robin_Open_Rare: Hello? Oh, hi @! *BANG*... Um, one sec... (Muffled Voice: Honey, could you close the door? I'm trying to run a business here.)... Sorry! Yes, I'm open until 17:00 today. See you later! *click*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Closed: Hey, it's Robin. My business hours are from 09:00 to 17:00. Please come by then if you need anything! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Clint_Open: Hello? Oh, hey, @. Yup, I'm open for business until 16:00. Er... Okay. Goodbye. *click*
Entries.Phone_Clint_Open_Rare: Hello? Yes, yes, I'm open until 16:00. Gotta go. *click*^Hello? Oh... @... Your voice sounds really nice over the phone... Uh... Okay. Understood. I'm open until 16:00. *slam*$4
Entries.Phone_Clint_Closed: You've reached Clint's answering machine. I'm not available right now... My business hours are from 09:00 to 16:00. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Open: {{PierreShopName}}! Oh, hello, @! Yes, I'm open until 17:00 today. Please come by for great deals on seeds and produce! Goodbye. *click*
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Open_Rare: Abigail! Your guinea pig is loose again! Come here *right now* and take care of this! $3#$b#Oh! Uh... Hello? Thank you for calling. Y... Yes, we're open until 17:00. Goodbye. *click*$4
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Closed: Thank you for calling {{PierreShopName}}. We're closed at the moment, but our hours are 09:00 to 17:00. See you then! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Gus_Closed_NoDishOfTheDay: Hello, this is Gus from the Stardrop Saloon. We're currently closed. Please stop in between 12:00 and 00:00 if you'd like some of our delicious food and drink. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Marnie_Open: Hello? Oh, hi @! Yes, my shop is open until 16:00 today. Hope to see you soon! *click*
Entries.Phone_Marnie_Closed: Hello, you've reached Marnie's Ranch. My business hours are from 09:00 to 16:00. Please come visit me then. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Ring_RoboCaller: You hear a robotic voice on the other end. # Congratulations. . . You. Have. A. 10,000g. JOJA. Rebate. Waiting. For. You. . . Please. Post. Your. Credit. Card. Number. To. 133. N. Gunger St. Zuzu. City. To. Receive. Your. Rebate. . . *CLICK*
Entries.Phone_Ring_Pierre: Hey, @. It's me, Pierre. #$b#How are you doing? Good? That's good.#$b#Well, I just wanted to say that I appreciate your business. And I'd like to remind you that {{PierreShopName}} carries *the finest* seeds and produce anywhere.#$b#I hope to see you in the store very soon. Bye! *click*
